participant_1.background:
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
I am a single, language genius who enjoys shopping and collecting memories from my travels.
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i hate running.

participant_2.background:
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
i live on a ranch.
i m too short to reach the top shelf.
i am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay! Just got back from running some errands, and I'm about to start cooking dinner.
I'm making a homemade pasta dish. I'm an amateur chef, and I cook five different cuisines.
That sounds delicious! I'm not really much of a cook, but I love to eat.
Well, you're in luck! I'm always happy to share my cooking with friends.
That's so nice of you! I'd love to try some of your pasta sometime.
Perfect! I'll make you a batch this weekend, and we can have a pasta party.
That sounds like a great idea! I'll bring the wine.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited to cook for you.
Me too! I'm sure it will be delicious.
